data.eml:eml: Description of a new species of Platynus Bonelli from the Appalachian Mountains of eastern North America (Coleoptera, Carabidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bousquet, Yves (2012): Description of a new species of Platynus Bonelli from the Appalachian Mountains of eastern North America (Coleoptera, Carabidae). ZooKeys 163: 69-81, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.163.2295, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.163.2295
